wikipedia_page.main: David G Hull (born 1944) is a Northern Irish international lawn and indoor bowler.He won a bronze medal in the triples at the 1976 World Outdoor Bowls Championship in Johannesburg.He was Irish bowler of the year in 1971.

response: David Hull may also refer to:
*David Hull (rugby league) (born 1951), English rugby league footballer of the 1970s and 1980s
*David Hull (bowls) (born 1944), Irish lawn and indoor bowler
